NOTICE_DATA.n2016:PERFORMANCE_NUTS: ПОРАНЕШНА ЈУГОСЛОВЕНСКА РЕПУБЛИКА МАКЕДОНИЈА (PORANEŠNA JUGOSLOVENSKA REPUBLIKA MAKEDONIJA)
ПОРАНЕШНА ЈУГОСЛОВЕНСКА РЕПУБЛИКА МАКЕДОНИЈА (PORANEŠNA JUGOSLOVENSKA REPUBLIKA MAKEDONIJA)
NOTICE_DATA.n2016:CA_CE_NUTS: ПОРАНЕШНА ЈУГОСЛОВЕНСКА РЕПУБЛИКА МАКЕДОНИЈА (PORANEŠNA JUGOSLOVENSKA REPUBLIKA MAKEDONIJA)

ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Ss. Cyril and Methodius University Faculty of Medicine Skopje

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Ss. Cyril and Methodius University Faculty of Medicine Skopje

TITLE.P: Chemicals and reagents Compatible for the Device for Hybridization BeeBlot or Equivalent

SHORT_DESCR.P: Chemicals and reagents compatible for the device for hybridization BeeBlot or equivalent.

TITLE.P: Set of Reagents for the Detection of HLA A Alleles. To Include at Least the Following Reagents: Labeled Strips, Denaturation Solution, Hybridization Solution, Detergent

MAIN_SITE.P: Ss. Cyril and Methodius University, Faculty of Medicine —Skopje, 50 Divizija No. 6, 1000 Skopje, Republic of Macedonia.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Set of reagents for the detection of HLA A alleles. To include at least the following reagents: labeled strips, denaturation solution, hybridization solution, detergent (under strictly controlled conditions — temperature and time) for washing non-specific bonds, conjugate, conjugate diluent, substrate BCIP/NBT, substrate buffer and solution, compatible for device BeeBlot or equivalent.

TITLE.P: Set of reagents for the detection of HLA B alleles.

MAIN_SITE.P: Ss. Cyril and Methodius University, Faculty of Medicine —Skopje, 50 Divizija No. 6, 1000 Skopje, Republic of Macedonia.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Set of reagents for the detection of HLA B alleles. To include at least the following reagents: labeled strips, denaturation solution, hybridization solution, detergent (under strictly controlled conditions - temperature and time) for washing the non-specifically bound probes, conjugate, conjugate diluent, substrate BCIP / NBT, substrate buffer and washing solution, compatible for device BeeBlot or equivalent.

TITLE.P: Set of reagents for the detection of HLA C alleles

MAIN_SITE.P: Ss. Cyril and Methodius University, Faculty of Medicine —Skopje, 50 Divizija No. 6, 1000 Skopje, Republic of Macedonia.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Set of reagents for the detection of HLA C alleles. To include at least the following reagents; labeled strips, denaturation solution, hybridization solution, detergent (under strictly controlled conditions - temperature and time) for washing the non-specifically bound probes, conjugate, conjugate diluent, BCIP / NBT substrate, substrate buffer and washing solution, compatible with the device BeeBlot or equivalent.

TITLE.P: Set of reagents for the detection of HLA DRB decoder alleles

MAIN_SITE.P: Ss. Cyril and Methodius University, Faculty of Medicine —Skopje, 50 Divizija No. 6, 1000 Skopje, Republic of Macedonia.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Set of reagents for the detection of HLA DRB decoder alleles. To include at least the following reagents; labeled strips, hybridization solution, detergent (which under strictly controlled conditions - temperature and time) for washing the non-specifically bound probes, conjugate, conjugate diluent, BCIP / NBT substrate, substrate buffer and washing solution, compatible for device BeeBlot or equivalent.

TITLE.P: Set of reagents for detection of at least 9 mutations (FV G1691A (Leiden), FV H1299R (R2), Prothrombin G20210A, MTHFR C677T, MTHFR A1298C, Factor XIII V34L, PAI-1 4G / 5G, EPCR A4600G, EPCR G4678C)

MAIN_SITE.P: Ss. Cyril and Methodius University, Faculty of Medicine —Skopje, 50 Divizija No. 6, 1000 Skopje, Republic of Macedonia.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Set of reagents for detection of at least 9 mutations (FV G1691A (Leiden), FV H1299R (R2), Prothrombin G20210A, MTHFR C677T, MTHFR A1298C, Factor XIII V34L, PAI-1 4G / 5G, EPCR A4600G, EPCR G4678C) cardiovascular diseases. The offered set of reagents shall include at least the following reagents; labeled strips for the detection of mutations, lysing solution, amplification mix, Taq Dilution Buffer, DNAT, hybridization solution, washing solution A, conjugate solution, washing solution B, compatible for device BeeBlot or equivalent

TITLE.P: Set of reagents for detection of at least 8 mutations (eNOS -786 TC, eNOS G894T, LTA C804A, ACE I / D, GPIIIa L33P (HPA-1),? -Fibrinogen -455 GA, Apo B R3500Q, Apo E2 / E3 / E4)

MAIN_SITE.P: Ss. Cyril and Methodius University, Faculty of Medicine —Skopje, 50 Divizija No. 6, 1000 Skopje, Republic of Macedonia.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Set of reagents for detection of at least 8 mutations (eNOS -786 TC, eNOS G894T, LTA C804A, ACE I / D, GPIIIa L33P (HPA-1),? -Fibrinogen -455 GA, Apo B R3500Q, Apo E2 / E3 / E4) triggers of cardiovascular diseases. The offered set of reagents includes at least the following reagents: labeled strips for mutation detection, lysis solution, amplification mix, Taq Dilution Buffer, DNAT, hybridization solution, washing solution A, conjugate solution, washing solution B, compatible for device BeeBlot or equivalent

TITLE.P: Set of reagents for detection of intolerance to lactose and fructose. The offered set of reagents includes at least the following reagents: labeled strips for the detection of at least 6 mutations

MAIN_SITE.P: Ss. Cyril and Methodius University, Faculty of Medicine —Skopje, 50 Divizija No. 6, 1000 Skopje, Republic of Macedonia.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Set of reagents for detection of intolerance to lactose and fructose. The offered set of reagents includes at least the following reagents: labeled strips for the detection of at least 6 mutations (Aldo B delE4, Aldo B A174D, Aldo B A149P, Aldo B N334K, LCT -13910 T> C, LCT -22018 A> G), lime solution, amplification mix, Taq Dilution Buffer, DNAT, hybridization solution, washing solution- A, conjugate solution, washing solution -B, compatible for device BeeBlot or equivalent

TITLE.P: Set of reagent for the detection of cytochrome genetic mutations (CYP), CYP2C19.

MAIN_SITE.P: Ss. Cyril and Methodius University, Faculty of Medicine —Skopje, 50 Divizija No. 6, 1000 Skopje, Republic of Macedonia.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Set of reagent for the detection of cytochrome genetic mutations (CYP), CYP2C19. The offered set of reagents includes at least the following reagents: labeled strips for mutation detection, lysis solution, amplification mix, Taq Dilution Buffer, DNAT, hybridization solution, washing solution A, conjugate solution, washing solution B, compatible for device BeeBlot or equivalent

TITLE.P: Set of reagent for the detection of cytochrome genetic mutations (CYP), CYP2D6 set. The offered set of reagents includes at least the following reagents:

MAIN_SITE.P: Ss. Cyril and Methodius University, Faculty of Medicine —Skopje, 50 Divizija No. 6, 1000 Skopje, Republic of Macedonia.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Set of reagent for the detection of cytochrome genetic mutations (CYP), CYP2D6 set. The offered set of reagents includes at least the following reagents: labeled strips for mutation detection, lysis solution, amplification mix, Taq Dilution Buffer, DNAT, hybridization solution, washing solution A, conjugate solution, washing solution B, compatible for device BeeBlot or equivalent

TITLE.P: Set of reagents for the detection of HLA DQB1 alleles. To include at least the following reagents;

SHORT_DESCR.P: Set of reagents for the detection of HLA DQB1 alleles. To include at least the following reagents; labeled strips, hybridization solution, detergent (which under strictly controlled conditions -temperature and time) for washing the non-specifically bound probioconugate, conjugate diluent, substrateBCIP / NBT, substrate buffer and solvent solution compatible for device BeeBlot or equivalent.

TITLE.P: GX-HIV Strip Assay (20 tests) for the genotyping of a DNA sample to determine the response to high active anti-retroviral therapy (HAART)

SHORT_DESCR.P: GX-HIV Strip Assay (20 tests) for the genotyping of a DNA sample to determine the response to high active anti-retroviral therapy (HAART). The offered set of reagents to include at least the following reagents; labeled strips for the detection of mutations, lysing solution, amplification mix, Taq Dilution Buffer, DNAT, hybridization solution, washing solution A, conjugate solution, washing solution B, compatible for device BeeBlot or equivalent.

SUITABILITY.P: — Statement by the economic operator that it has not been sentenced, in the last 5 years, with effective court decision for participation in criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering,
— certificate that it is not subject to bankruptcy procedure issued by competent authority,
— certificate that it is not subject to liquidation procedure issued by competent authority,
— certificate for paid taxes, contributions and other public dues by the competent authority in the country where that economic operator is established,

— certificate from the legal entities penal registry that it is not being imposed a side sanction — prohibition to participate in public competitions, public procurement contract award and public-private partnership contract award procedures,
— certificate from the legal entities penal registry that it is not being imposed a side sanction — temporary or permanent prohibition to perform certain professional activity,

— certificate that it is not being sanctioned for misdemeanor with an effective court decision, resulting in prohibition for pursuing professional activity or duty, i.e. temporary prohibition for performing certain business activity,
— ability of the economic operator to perform business activity,
— certificate for wholesale of medical devices in accordance with the Law on medicines and medical devices.

PERFORMANCE_CONDITIONS.P: Contract performance guarantee: Bank Guarantee of 10 %.

INFO_ADD_EAUCTION.P: To participate on electronic auction economic operators need to register on ESPP (Electronic System for Public Procurement) website: www.e-nabavki.gov.mk
Tender documentation, technical specification, forms and information for open procedure No. 16/2019 are provided on the same website

PLACE.P: Electronically, ESJN (https://www.e-nabavki.gov.mk/); Ss. Cyril and Methodius University, Faculty of Medicine —Skopje, 50 Divizija No. 6, 1000 Skopje, Republic of Macedonia.

INFO_ADD.P: Note: the economic operator upon delivery should submit a certificate for placing a medicinal device on the market or temporary or permanent approval for parallel import, in accordance with the Law on medical products and medical devices, for the items with code numbers 9423, 7058, 7059, 7959, 8810, 8811, 7042, 7043, 7044, 7045, 9270 (see Tender Documentation).

ADDRESS_REVIEW_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Body responsible for appeal procedures: State Appeals Commission for Public Procurement
